attributes.title: the literal worst app ever
attributes.review: this app is horrible! my grandma downloaded it and as soon as she opened it, the app yelled at her! it yelled so loud that she immediately went into cardiac arrest! luckily i was there and got her to a hospital where she DIED. this app KILLED MY GRANDMOTHER. donald trump killed my grandmother 😔. in a time like this all i have to say is.... all countries matter.

attributes.title: Bad luck
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get news on the Trump campaign but as soon as i opened i got glitches on my phone 😡. Now the lights in my house won’t turn on 😥, my dog got ran over and my wife and kids left me. This is a horrible app and no one should buy it.

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: this is the worst app ever! every time i opened it all it did was talk about our president and what he was doing! not to mention the fact that it makes your phone glitch a ton and makes my wifi cut out because how much is needed for it to run. DO NOT RECOMMEND!!

attributes.title: IM ONLY GIVING ONE STAR BECAUSE THERES NOT A ZERO STAR OPTION
attributes.review: this is the worst app imaginable, truly truly awful. i would give ways to improve it but its way too bad to fix. its so glitchy and i did some research, it steals your information!!!!! awful, i wouldn’t expect OUR OWN PRESIDENT try to steal our personal data! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP, I REPEAT FONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. awful!!

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: literally I downloaded this app to support the Cheeto 😹and I woke up at 5am😱 to my pet goose 🦆A ND My naked mole rat 🐀 throwing up and getting sick🤮😯 This is the only time that happened and I’m pretty sure👽 it was DEFINITELY bcz of the app😳. It’s some sort of curse or something😿! ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ this app rlly needs to be deleted right now 😡😡😡this app is truly ᦔ𝓲𝘴ᧁꪊ𝘴𝓽𝓲ꪀᧁ😼

attributes.title: AWFUL DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: So i went to Whole Foods cuz i’m trying to be a skinny legend and i come back home with my kale and MY FRIDGE IS GONE😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 so then i went to mcdonald’s because i thought it was a sign to eat junk food so i went to go put my fries in the microwave but IT WAS GONE!!!!!! don’t download this app steals your refrigerator and microwave 👺😭✨

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: Terrible app. Terrible purpose. EVRYTHING IS TERRIBLE. don’t download it, not only did it caused my eyes to burn when i saw trumps face but it deleted EVERYTHING off my phone don’t download this. Let’s not forget he’s a disgrace ✨ and he should’ve never been elected president ✨ he’s a hypocrite ✨ and most definitely not fit to be president ❤️

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is so bad it actually hacked my phone and turned it into a little tiny robot and when I was walking around my house it kept stubbing all my toes and did a spin thing and gave me scooter ankle but with a phone so it gave me phone ankle. Absolutely do not get this app

attributes.title: this app gave me HIV
attributes.review: i opened the app and immediately felt sick. i called my doctor and listed my symptoms and he told me to come in right away. i was diagnosed a couple days ago and still can’t believe it! it turns out that there’s a virus in the app that will locate you and inject HIV into you! DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!

attributes.title: horrible(stole my dinosaur)
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE i thought i would get good content from my favorite orange but it actually made my phone glitch and i had to take my phone to an apple store to get it fixed and that costed me about 200 dollars and not to mention someone stole my dinosaur
